typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Certification_Type as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as string,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOpsCertificationType
LookupCertificationType derive(CertificationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_Type_Code_Lkp), "Certification Type", ""),
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_End_Date), "Certification End Date", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',CertificationTypeValidateMsg,CertificationEndDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutput
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concatWS("/", CertificationTypeValidateMsg, CertificationEndDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Certification_Type,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		RowNumber,
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Certification_Type_Lkp,
		CertificationTypeValidateMsg,
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Certification_ID = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Next_Audit_Date = toDate(Next_Audit_Date),
		Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date),
		Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date),
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS = toInteger(Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS),
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS = toInteger(Number_of_Open_Major_CARS),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp = Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Type_Lkp = Certification_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCertificationTypeLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectCertificationTypeLkp lookup(Certification_Type == Certification_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(ERROR_FUNCTION(''), true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCertificationType
SelectedColumnsOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("-", $WorkbookName, $TabName))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Validation_Flag = {Validation Flag},
		Certification_Type = {Certification Type},
		Certification_Number = {Certification Number},
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit Date},
		Certifying_Body = {Certifying Body},
		Certification_Date = {Certification Date},
		Certification_End_Date = {Certification End Date},
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquet
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer,
		Source_File as string,
		Source_Sub_File as string,
		Error_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Minor_CARS = Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS = Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Asset_Id as string,
		Fund_Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Asset_Id = Asset_ID,
		Fund_Id = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OpsWorkbookWorksheetList
